attributes.action: Make the 24th of June a National holiday day. Britain Day.
attributes.additional_details: Over 17m people voted to leave the EU. That'll be enough background information, evidence and multiple references!
attributes.background:
17m people (whether you agree or not) wanted to change their country. Nobody has a crystal ball and NOBODY knows what is going to happen. So speculation is a waste of time for mere mortals like us British folk.
I guarantee you would love another day off in the year to remember this day!
